cloud-platform.title: Cloud Platform
cloud-platform.description: 82 percent of businesses drive innovation by blending their on-premises infrastructure with the cloud. The modern cloud platform is focused on creatign consistency between on-premise services and their counterparts in the cloud while maintaining the agility that the cloud offers out of the box.

modern-web.title: Modern Web
modern-web.description: The modern web is composed of many open source web framework for building modern web applications and services. With frameworks like Angular, ASP.NET and Node; you can quickly create web sites using the well-understood standards of HTML, CSS and JavaScript. The websites can then scale to millions of users and easily add more complex capabilities like APIs, forms or real time communications.
